name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment
displayName: NFDI4Health Metadata Schema V3.3 â€“ UC 5.1 Diet Assessment Block

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment
dataverseAlias: Diet assessment information collected in the [RESOURCE]
displayName: Group of items providing information on diet assessment.

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment.instrument
displayName: Specification of the dietary assessment instrument used in the [RESOURCE]. Select one value from the list.

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment.ffqItemsNumber
displayName: The number of items inquired by the food frequency questionnaire (FFQ).

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment.mode
dataverseAlias: Mode(s) used to apply the dietary assessment instrument
displayName: Specification of how the dietary assessment instrument was applied to participants of the [RESOURCE]. Select all that apply.

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment.device
dataverseAlias: Device(s) used to apply the dietary assessment instrument
displayName: Specification of device(s) used to apply the dietary assessment instrument to participants of the [RESOURCE]. Select all that apply.

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment.portionSizeEstimation
displayName: Specification of how the portion size is inquired in the dietary assessment instrument. Select all that apply.

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment.referencePeriodUnit
displayName: Indication of the reference period the dietary assessment instrument refers to (e.g. 24-h recall refers to the previous day). Select one value from the list.

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment.referencePeriodNumber
dataverseAlias: Numerical value of reference period units
displayName: Indication of the number of reference period units assessed.

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment.repeat
displayName: Indication whether the same instrument was applied repeatedly.

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment.repeatFrequency
displayName: Indication of how often the dietary assessment instrument was repeatedly applied.

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment.validity
displayName: Indication whether the dietary assessment instrument was validated.

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment.validityReference
displayName: Indication of the reference describing the validation.

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment.reliability
displayName: Indication whether the dietary assessment instrument was described according to its reliability.

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment.reliabilityReference
displayName: Indication of the reference describing the reliability measures.

name: resource.customMetadata.dietAssessment.dietarySupplements
displayName: Indication whether the dietary assessment instrument inquires information about dietary supplements.
